extendedInfo.description: NEW Ghost hunting Technology!Turns your Android device into a working âSpirit Boxâ.*TOP 20 IN GOOGLE PLAY LIFESTYLE APPS!*USED AND TRUSTED BY BILL MURPHY OF TV'S FACT OR FAKED. BARRY FITZGERALD & ROBB DEMAREST FROM GHOST HUNTERS INTERNATIONAL.**NEW VERSION 2.3**I am so happy to announce the release of the Sv-1 SpiritVox Ghost Box for Android Version 2.3! (SEE "WHAT'S NEW") NEW AUDIO ENGINES RECORDING FUNCTION AND FILE BROWSER!ALL NEW CHANNEL B!This is the  update since the app launch 3 months ago. I was working on a new way to produce the random noise and create a whole new audio engine for SpiritVox 2.0. However, unable to decide which to use in the new version I decided to include BOTH audio generators! There are 2 channels of random noise. Channel 1 is the ORIGINAL SV-1 SpiritVox sound proven to work by Ghost Hunters around the world & Channel B, the NEW SpiritVox Random carrier signal. The NEW "Noise Blend" feature allows you to blend the 2 signals any way you wish for more ways to experiment.Also fixed: App now runs in the background allowing you to record on the same device. (User requested) Added social bookmarks and blog link / Exit on menu press.I am now recommending leaving wifi on and using headphones due to the overwhelming amount of reports of this being effective by SpiritVox users. I hope you enjoy this new version of the SV-1. I cannot wait to hear what you catch!*******This Ghost hunting / Paranormal investigation app uses your devices internal audio playback algorithms to generate 2 sets of random carrier sounds that changes every 8th of a second. The 2 channels of random sounds can be blended as you wish. Channel A is the original SV-1 sound and channel B is the NEW audio engine sound. Created with hundreds of random sounds from static to speech.Trusted and used by thousands of Paranormal researchers around the world from professional to amateur. Thousand of results reported worldwide. SpiritVox has been used in the worlds most haunted locations by some of the most famous and well respected ghost hunters in the US, Canada, Norway and the United Kingdom. NO false positives. Guaranteed to be free of all radio interference.THIS APP DOES NOT USE RADIO WAVES!Hardware "Spirit boxes" can cost hundreds of dollars and are difficult to build yourself. They are also open to radio interference and random phonetic sounds. The SV-1 SpiritVox is capable of producing results you can be confident in for a FRACTION of a hardware device! This is one tool your research group cannot afford to go without! NOT A NOVELTY ITEM, This APP is designed by ghost hunters for ghost hunters!SpiritVox on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/bigbeardaudio/videosVersion 2.0 Audio Demo http://spiritvox.bigbeardaudio.com/?p=160###PLEASE NOTE: users are reporting results with wifi and data etc enabled. Some report that voices and sounds  are clearer or louder this way. Feel free to experiment and try for yourself. It does seem possible to me that the wireless signal could aid in this phenomenon. ###*For best results turn your devices volume to 10, place on a hard surface with your device speaker facing down and prop the device up 1/2 to 1 inch above the surface. External speakers are recommended if you are using a phone without a loud speaker. Tablet speakers have been found to work very well and seem to be loud enough on their own.PLEASE NOTE: Results may vary! Please don't rate  low if you don't hear a ghost, neither me or anyone else can guarantee this will happen! SpiritVox is trusted and used by over 200 Paranormal Research teams around the world! Including North London Paranormal, Paranormal Moms, ParaSpin Paranormal,BAT Paranormal, ghost Night Events UK and more!Questions? Got results you would like to share? Visit our blog: http://spiritvox.bigbeardaudio.com/follow on Twitter: @spiritvoxapp TWEET THE HASH #spiritvox TO REACH ME DIRECTLY ANYTIME!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Excellent app! As for comments regarding authenticity the cut up voice samples are used for spirits to manipulate to hear them. I have had loads of results using developers apps I reccomend echovox best by far! Update soon please ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: Much better since update! I turned it on & immediately started getting voices! Thank you!!
reviews.author: Marilyn C.

reviews.title: I can hear radio voices and words
reviews.comment: So i get words from the airwaves not spirit voices i can telk the diffrence and the pre recorded looping sounds like laughing i dunno... I had faith this app woulda been great but guess i gotta buy a real spirit box
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time
reviews.comment: Why do I say time because that\'s what it takes . This is a great tool for all beginners and advanced ghost hunters alike. I left this on for a while to warm up and soon it was giving me names and places . Give this a chance , it all takes time in any investigation great app Danny
reviews.author: Ian Clark

reviews.title: Would give five
reviews.comment: But runs about 30 second and cuts off. Though I love new update just wish it would run longer. Better on new phone s4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: This is the ultra experimental ghost hunting tool that actually works. Never have I seen a developer respond, follow back on twitter and become a friend before. The newest update totally fixed the bugs I was having in the last version.  Get this app, this is no joke fake app, this is a super powerful tool!
reviews.author: Pat Mabie

reviews.title: Question....
reviews.comment: I can\'t hear voices because of all of the noise when it\'s on \"B\". Is there a way to hear them better or listen to the results on playback without the static? Also my ears feel like they are pulsating when it is set to \"B\". Is there a reason for that? Not sure about this apps rating yet but for now I\'ll give it a 3. Thanks! :)
reviews.author: julie marmion

reviews.title: Really
reviews.comment: I have researched the paranormal for years first off and I  liked this app at first but now not so much . reason the channel b is a loop of random voice and noise. I know this cause the same semi voice kept coming thru like clockwork every 30 to 40 seconds I don\'t think I have a foreign Asian or Mexican  sounding man in my house or car or place of work. Really guys come on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT GOOD
reviews.comment: This app has too much interferance, I can\'t tell whether the voices I\'m hearing is spirits or stations
reviews.author: Seth Wilhelm

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Love it! Works great with my external speaker. Loud clear replies and had a small convo. Thanks again Danny!
reviews.author: Anthony Yovino

reviews.title: Hated at but got better
reviews.comment: Listen, I know that some of You are saying that it doesn\'t work and it\'s fake,But you just have to get a chance, you have to give it time.
reviews.author: Racheal Couture

reviews.title: Horrible upgrade
reviews.comment: This app really worked well before they did whatever horrible upgrades. The sound is all chopped now with s spanish guy coming through. Can you pls fix and change it back?
reviews.author: Jenny Marie

reviews.title: Works but diffrent
reviews.comment: Just updated to 2.3. A sounds the same but, once i moved to b, i started to hear voices and a forign guy.never did.i hear vocies on b side b4.are u.suppost to hear them once u move to b.its a great app.worth the money.also i use this app to use the sounds to help with evp on a diffrent phone.thx for making it.
reviews.author: David Mcminn

reviews.title: Got results first use.
reviews.comment: I have used many of big beard\'s apps and this one does not disappoint. I will continue to use it in my investigations. Thanks again Danny.
reviews.author: Allison Lambert

reviews.comment: Everyone please read the description on how the thing works before complaining, it is meant to use random snippets of preinstalled sounds with a mixing algorithm to make what you need to communicate with what your trying to communicate with. Stop and find out if you know what a spirit box is before spouting out of your facehole about how fake it is. The Dev works hard on thus stuff and one of these days might just give up cause you people don\'t have the intelligence to understand the physics behind the program.
reviews.author: DesMoines TheLazyEyedGamer

reviews.title: U Have 2 Be Patient
reviews.comment: I understand what people r saying about the Spanish guy. I hear him too. So common sense would be 4 u 2 just discount that voice. U actually hear more when u play it back then u do in real time.I have received some direct answers. A few yes\'s ,and an actual name. Not every session is going to have a ton of responses but if u know about spirit boxes then u know that\'s normal. I think this app does what it says & it works.This is as close as ur gonna get to a Spirit box w/o actually buying a real 1.
reviews.author: Nicole Sadler

reviews.title: This is not a prank, It works.
reviews.comment: Last night we tested this app, we got a voice saying \"Como estas Maria?\" (How are you Maria?) Maria she is the homeowner, and se ID the voice, IT WAS HER DECEASED FATHER.
reviews.author: Javy Vargas

reviews.title: Ok but..........
reviews.comment: I think this app really works hence the 3 stars but I could live without the looped recording going at the same time in the background. Makes it too difficult to here what the real spirit is trying to say at times and differentiate.  Really bad idea. I will keep trying to use for a while but will probably end up deleting if you don\'t loose the looped voices that are on here. I will come back and give 5 stars when and if this is fixed.
reviews.author: Jamie Lajoie

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: used it a few times never caught anything until yesterday ..a clear voice said do you know me .really works ...great app ..
reviews.author: carrie wasdin

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have been using the PSB7 spirit box for a couple years now.  This app is pretty much just like that except cheaper :)  I even wrote to the publisher and received a quick response.   In first testing the app, I had a conversation with them about my fiance\'s ridiculously high heels.  And it stated what state we were in and I got some direct responses.  A useful tool in case you forget your spirit box, and a useful tool all on its own.  I love this app.
reviews.author: Megan McFarland
